title: My Xbox one keeps turning itself off everytime I turn it on, What's going on? - Quora

response.answer_text: Had the same situation. It’s probably because of how either old it is or dirty. Usually when it’s clean it runs pretty well but since your Xbox has a vent in it it’s pretty tuff to clean it off. Either that or it’s to old. Usually consoles start to slow down like mine and I soon needed to just get a better Xbox in a better condition.

Does it turn itself off instantly when you turn it on? Or after a while? If it shuts down after a while, then it might be the auto turn off feature in settings. Just go to settings, power, and disable the auto turn off feature.
